Reviews.Title: Unlock phone that is still locked
Reviews.Author: Ioan Bodrean
Reviews.Content: I order un unlock cell phone and I got a lock one so right now I can not use it.

Reviews.Title: I feel cheated
Reviews.Author: E. Femenias
Reviews.Content: I feel cheated because clearly I buy a phone with the following characteristicsUnlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and HSDPA 850/1900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilitiesMain features: Android OS version 2. 1,copied verbatim from the Amazon sales pageand none of this has sent me the phone qeu is theft and a lack of ethics that advertise one thing and send another,I disbursed over the phone more expensive suchnot to send me this filth does not have the android 2.1 and also the 3G band HSDPA 850/1900

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carries like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and HSDPA 850/1900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
5 MP Camera, 2592 x 1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging and Video Recording; Wi-Fi 802. 11 b/g; GPS with A-GPS support; Android OS, MOTOBLUR UI with Live Widgets; Bluetooth v2. 1 with A2DP (Stereo) and microSD slot, up to 32GB.
Social networking integration with live updates, Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube and Google Talk integration; Gorilla Glass display; Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate; SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM and Stereo FM radio with RDS.
Talk time up to 7 hours - Standby up to 500 hours.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MB501 Cliq XT - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black
